snippet: Turkey is continuing to push the Obama administration to impose a no-fly zone or safe area along the Turkish-Syrian border, administration officials said Monday, but obstacles remain.
abstract: Turkey continues to urge United States to establish no-fly zone or safe area along Turkish-Syrian border, but no deal has been made; Obama administration officials say that they have not yet decided on whether to commit to what would be significant increase in American military engagement in the area.
lead_paragraph: Turkey is continuing to push the Obama administration to impose a no-fly zone or safe area along the Turkish-Syrian border, administration officials said Monday, but obstacles remain.

headline.main: No Agreement Reached on Syrian No-Fly Zone
headline.print_headline: No Agreement Reached on Syrian No-Fly Zone
